origins.name: Dragonsoul
origins.desc: The first Dragonsoul allies to take damage in combat receives the Dragon's Blessing. While blessed, the unit gains bonus stats, and every 5th attack fires a Dragonsoul blast, dealing 40% of the target's maximum Health in magic damage. On death, this blessing passes to the closest Dragonsoul ally without a blessing.

origins.name: Elderwood
origins.desc: Every two seconds all Elderwood champions grow, gaining bonus stats. This effect stacks up to five times.

origins.name: Exile
origins.desc: If an Exile has no adjacent allies at the start of combat, they gain:

origins.name: Ninja
origins.desc: Ninjas gain bonus Attack Damage and Spell Power. This trait is only active when you have exactly 1 or 4 unique Ninjas.

origins.name: Spirit
origins.desc: The first time a Spirit casts their spell, all allies gain Attack Speed.

classes.name: Adept
classes.desc: Adepts calm the flow of battle, reducing the Attack Speed of all enemies by 50% for a few seconds at the start of combat.

classes.name: Assassin
classes.desc: Innate: At the start of combat, Assassins leap to the enemy backline. Assassins gain bonus Critical Strike Damage and Chance, and their spells can critically strike.

classes.name: Brawler
classes.desc: Brawlers gain bonus Health and Attack Damage

classes.name: Executioner
classes.desc: Executioner attacks and spells always critically hit targets below a certain percent threshold of health.

classes.name: Mage
classes.desc: Mages cast twice and have modified Spell Power.

classes.name: Sharpshooter
classes.desc: Sharpshooters' attacks and spells ricochet to nearby enemies, dealing reduced damage.

classes.name: Syphoner
classes.desc: All allies heal for some of the damage they deal with spells and attacks.

classes.name: Vanguard
classes.desc: Vanguard champions gain bonus Armor and Magic Resist
